popup_header_description.message: Real-time safety indicators that warn you about inappropriate Roblox users before you interact with them.

banner_advanced_violation_message.message: Enable advanced violation details for better insights

banner_advanced_violation_title_go_to_se.message: Go to advanced violation details setting

settings_developer_unlocked.message: Developer mode unlocked! Advanced settings are now available.

settings_help_theme.message: Auto follows Roblox's theme setting. Light and Dark override this preference.

settings_help_advanced_violations.message: Display detailed violation messages and evidence. May contain mature content.

settings_help_debug_logging.message: Show detailed logs in the browser console (F12 -> Console) for troubleshooting.

settings_help_cache_duration.message: How long to cache user status data (1-10 minutes). Higher values reduce API calls but may show outdated information.

settings_modal_warning_intro.message: Advanced violation details may contain sensitive content

settings_modal_warning_continuation.message: that is referenced from user profiles and activities that violated platform policies.

settings_modal_enabled_item1.message: Detailed violation messages explaining why a user was flagged

settings_modal_enabled_item2.message: Evidence snippets containing the policy-violating content found

settings_modal_enabled_item3.message: Specific examples of violations from user profiles and activities

settings_modal_considerations_item1.message: Content may include material that violates platform community standards

settings_modal_considerations_item2.message: This information is intended for moderation and safety purposes only

settings_modal_considerations_item3.message: If you prefer not to view detailed violation evidence, keep this setting disabled

settings_modal_considerations_item4.message: You can disable this feature at any time in the settings

settings_modal_recommendation_text.message: Only enable this if you need detailed violation information for moderation purposes and understand that you may see content that violates community guidelines.

warzone_hunter_signup_description.message: Join the community to report high-risk confirmed users. Work together with hunters worldwide to increase takedown success and make Roblox safer for everyone.

warzone_hunter_feature_cleanup.message: Help clean up the platform and remove bad actors

warzone_hunter_feature_community.message: Work with the community for higher takedown success

warzone_hunter_feature_leaderboard.message: Earn points and climb the leaderboard

warzone_hunter_beta_text_before_link.message: Only available to selected users. Join our

warzone_hunter_welcome_message.message: Welcome, Hunter! You can now participate in War Zone activities and help protect the Roblox community. Visit the Roblox homepage to start your hunting missions.

warzone_hunter_confirm_logout.message:
Are you sure you want to logout?

You can login again anytime using your Discord account.

warzone_overview_error_no_users.message: No reportable users available. Check back later!

warzone_overview_error_auth_expired.message: Authentication expired. Please logout and login again.

warzone_overview_error_find_user.message: Failed to find reportable user. Please try again.

warzone_profile_confirm_logout.message:
Are you sure you want to logout?

You can login again anytime using your Discord account.

warzone_profile_confirm_reset_uuid.message:
Log out from all devices?

This will invalidate all active sessions on other devices. You will remain logged in on this device, but all other devices will be logged out.

This is useful if you suspect your account has been compromised.

warzone_profile_error_reset_uuid.message: Failed to log out from all devices. Please try again.

queue_popup_description_reanalysis.message: You are about to submit user (ID: $1) for reanalysis by our system.

queue_popup_description_analysis.message: You are about to submit user (ID: $1) for analysis by our system.

queue_popup_submission_type_heading.message: What type of submission is this?

queue_popup_option_inappropriate_descrip.message: This user has clear inappropriate content in their profile, avatar, friends, or groups.

queue_popup_option_general_description.message: I'm unsure but want this user analyzed for general safety assessment.

queue_popup_general_check_message.message: This user will be analyzed for general safety concerns. No specific flagging reasons required.

queue_popup_outfit_description.message: This user has inappropriate outfits or avatars.

queue_popup_profile_description.message: This user has inappropriate content in their username, display name, or description.

queue_popup_groups_description.message: This user is in inappropriate groups.

queue_popup_validation_error_message.message: Please select at least one flagging reason before proceeding.

queue_popup_lock_instruction.message: You must lock in your selection before submitting.

queue_popup_summary_outfit_selected.message: Will be prioritized for inappropriate outfits

queue_popup_summary_profile_selected.message: Will be prioritized for inappropriate profile content

queue_popup_summary_friends_selected.message: Will be prioritized for inappropriate friends

queue_popup_summary_groups_selected.message: Will be prioritized for inappropriate groups

queue_popup_unlock_instruction.message: Click to unlock and modify your selection.

queue_popup_review_process_step1.message: Analyzed by AI algorithms to detect potential safety concerns

queue_popup_review_process_step2.message: If flagged by AI, reviewed by human moderators for final confirmation

queue_popup_review_process_step3.message: Results added to database with appropriate safety rating

queue_popup_warning_message_suffix.message: (like spamming submissions) may result in restrictions on your account. Automated abuse detection is active.

friend_warning_risk_message.message: This user has been flagged by our detection system. Please review their profile before accepting this friend request.

friend_warning_why_matters_item1.message: This user may engage in inappropriate conversations or behaviors

friend_warning_why_matters_item2.message: Your account may be associated with inappropriate users in our system

friend_warning_why_matters_item3.message: You could be exposing yourself to unwanted or harmful content

friend_warning_why_matters_item4.message: This user has clear evidence of violating Roblox's Terms of Service

friend_warning_recommendations_item1.message: Review their profile information more carefully

friend_warning_recommendations_item2.message: Report them to Roblox if you see inappropriate content

friend_warning_recommendations_item3.message: Connect only with users you know and trust

friend_warning_high_risk_message.message: Proceeding with this friend request may expose you to inappropriate content or harmful interactions.

report_helper_subtitle_reportable.message: Rotector identified profile content violating Roblox's Terms of Service.

report_helper_action_message.message: Click below and Rotector will automatically fill the report form with the appropriate category and details.

report_helper_warning_message.message: Reports are filed under your Roblox account. Review all information before submitting and only report genuine violations.

report_helper_subtitle_not_reportable.message: Rotector hasn't detected any clearly reportable content in this user's profile description yet.

report_helper_info_message_part1.message: You can still submit a report

report_helper_info_message_part2.message: if you believe this user is violating Roblox's Terms of Service.

report_helper_info_message_part3.message: Rotector allows reporting of inappropriate content in profile descriptions. We don't detect most report categories, including:

report_helper_category_item1.message: Asking for or giving private information

report_helper_category_item5.message: Real life threats or suicide threats

report_helper_info_message_part4.message: If you're reporting any of these violations, please continue with your report and provide specific details to help Roblox moderators.

queue_error_modal_failed_message.message: Failed to queue user ID $1 for review.

queue_error_modal_step1.message: Check if the user has already been flagged by our system

queue_error_modal_step2.message: If the error persists, try again in a few minutes

queue_error_modal_step3.message: If you need support, include the Request ID above

queue_success_modal_success_message.message: User ID $1 has been successfully queued for review.

queue_success_modal_step1.message: Our AI will analyze this account for patterns of concern

queue_success_modal_step2.message: If flagged, the user's status will be confirmed within a few minutes

queue_success_modal_step3.message: Full system sync and confirmation will take 24-48 hours

report_page_manager_report_intro.message: This user's profile contains inappropriate content that violates Roblox's Terms of Service.

report_page_manager_success_message.message: Form filled successfully! Review and submit when ready.

report_page_manager_autofill_failed_clip.message: Auto-fill unavailable. Report text copied to clipboard. You can paste it into the comment field manually.

report_page_manager_autofill_failed.message: Auto-fill failed. Please manually fill the report form with the appropriate details.

tooltip_no_data_available.message: No data available for this API

tooltip_reportable_message.message: This user has clear evidence of inappropriate content that is visible to Roblox moderators.

tooltip_outfit_message.message: This user was flagged solely based on their avatar outfit. Outfit detection can have false positives, so please use your own judgment when evaluating this user.

tooltip_metadata_reprocess_title.message: This user's data is outdated. Click to requeue for analysis.

tooltip_header_unsafe.message: This $1 has been verified as inappropriate by human moderators.

tooltip_header_pending.message: This $1 has been flagged by AI with $2% confidence.

tooltip_header_queued_processing.message: This $1 is currently being checked by our system. This may take a few minutes.

tooltip_header_queued_safe.message: This $1 has been reviewed by our AI system and appears to be safe. If this is a false positive, you can requeue for further review.

tooltip_header_integration.message: This $1 has been flagged by a third-party content analysis system.

tooltip_header_mixed_group.message: This group contains a mix of appropriate and inappropriate members.

tooltip_header_mixed_user.message: This user has been associated with inappropriate content, but there isn't sufficient evidence for Roblox to take action. Exercise caution when interacting with them.

tooltip_header_past_offender.message: This $1 had inappropriate content previously but their account currently appears clean and can be requeued for verification.

tooltip_header_safe.message: This $1 has not been reviewed yet.

voting_description.message: Help others by confirming if this user's status is accurate.

engine_desc_unknown.message: This analysis used an AI engine with unknown compatibility status.

engine_desc_unknown_impact.message: Version compatibility could not be determined.

engine_desc_latest.message: This analysis used the most current AI engine with the latest detection capabilities.

engine_desc_latest_impact.message: Highest accuracy and most comprehensive analysis.

engine_desc_compatible.message: This analysis used an AI engine that is still supported but not the latest version.

engine_desc_compatible_impact.message: Still highly accurate with minor differences in detection capabilities.

engine_desc_outdated.message: This analysis used an AI engine that is significantly behind the latest version.

engine_desc_outdated_impact.message: May have reduced accuracy compared to newer engine versions.

engine_desc_deprecated.message: This analysis used an AI engine that is no longer supported.

engine_desc_deprecated_impact.message: Accuracy may be significantly reduced and results should be treated with caution.

custom_api_form_hint_url.message: Must be HTTPS. This is like the base URL for your API endpoints. We'll call {url}/user/{userId} for single lookups and {url}/users for batch lookups.

custom_api_form_hint_image.message: Upload a landscape image for the tooltip tab (PNG, JPG, SVG, WebP). Recommended: 480x160px (3:1 ratio).

custom_api_form_error_name_length.message: Name must be 12 characters or less

custom_api_form_error_timeout_min.message: Timeout must be at least 1000ms (1 second)

custom_api_form_error_timeout_max.message: Timeout must be 60000ms (60 seconds) or less

custom_api_form_error_image_type.message: Invalid file type. Please use PNG, JPG, SVG, or WebP

custom_api_form_error_image_mime.message: Invalid image type. MIME type does not match file extension

custom_api_form_error_image_size.message: Warning: Large file size ($1KB). Consider using a smaller image to reduce storage usage.

custom_api_mgmt_intro.message: Manage all API integrations in one place. Rotector provides core safety analysis, and you can add up to 5 custom APIs for additional content analysis.

custom_api_mgmt_notice_max_reached.message: Maximum of $1 custom APIs reached. Delete an existing API to add a new one.

custom_api_mgmt_test_success.message:
✓ Connection successful!

API "$1" is reachable and responding.

custom_api_mgmt_test_failed.message:
✗ Connection failed

API "$1" is not responding or returned an error.

Please check:
• URL is correct and accessible
• API server is running
• CORS is configured if needed

custom_api_mgmt_test_error.message:
✗ Connection test error

Failed to test API "$1".

Error: $2

custom_api_docs_intro.message: Implement two endpoints that return user status data. All responses must use the wrapper format with success, data, and error fields.

custom_api_docs_flag_type_2_note.message: Flag type 2 (Unsafe) is the primary type you need for indicating inappropriate users. Use other flag types only if you have a specific reason for categorizing users differently.

custom_api_docs_field_reasons.message: reasons (object) - String-based reason names as keys, each containing:

custom_api_docs_field_evidence.message: evidence (array or null) - Evidence strings or null

custom_api_docs_field_badges.message: badges (array) - Up to 3 custom badge objects, each containing:

custom_api_docs_field_badge_color.message: color (string, optional) - Background color (hex, rgb, or named color)

custom_api_docs_field_badge_text_color.message: textColor (string, optional) - Text color for contrast

custom_api_docs_note_https.message: All API endpoints must use HTTPS for security.

custom_api_docs_note_wrapper.message: All responses must use {success, data, error} format. When success: true, include data field. When success: false, include error message.

custom_api_docs_note_reason_keys.message: Use descriptive string names for reason keys (e.g., "High Risk Pattern", "Suspicious Activity"), not numeric indices. These display directly in tooltips.

custom_api_docs_note_badges.message: Badges are small visual indicators that appear in user tooltips alongside the flag status. They display at the top of the tooltip to quickly communicate additional context about a user. Use badges to highlight important status information like verification status, priority levels, or special categories. Common examples: "Verified Unsafe", "High Priority", "Community Reported", "Auto-Detected".

custom_api_docs_note_badge_colors.message: Badge colors support multiple formats: hex codes (#ef4444), RGB (rgb(239, 68, 68)), RGBA (rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.9)), or named colors (red). When color is not specified, badges use a default teal color. When textColor is not specified, badges use white text.

custom_api_docs_note_batch_data.message: The data field contains an object where keys are user IDs (as strings) and values are user status objects.
